page.title: 08SCHOOLS IN BICESTER.
page.content: EDUCATION:Oxfordshire County Council is responsible for the schools in Bicester PRIMARY:There are 5 primary schools including a Catholic and a Church of England one.Choice depends on where one lives and religous preference. SECONDARY:There are 2 comprehensives in the town;Bicester school and Cooper school.Pupils attend the school serving the catchment area in which they live. The only 6th form that is available is at Bicester school. SPECIAL:Bardwell school caters for handicapped children and is adjacent to Cooper school. ADULT:Both comprehensives have adult education facilities,which cater for day and evening classes in vocational and leisure activities.
